trans-unit.source: Collects all errors generated by the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 收集用于 SQL Server 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序生成的所有错误。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This class is created by <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException> to collect instances of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> class.
trans-unit.target: 此类创建用于<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>收集实例的<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError>类。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>

trans-unit.source: SqlErrorCollection always contains at least one instance of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> class.
trans-unit.target: SqlErrorCollection 始终包含至少一个实例的<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError>类。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError>

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref> collection into an <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 元素复制<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref>集合转换为<xref:System.Array>指定索引处开始。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> to copy elements into.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>要复制到的元素。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index from which to start copying into the `array` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 从其开始将复制到索引`array`参数。

trans-unit.source: The sum of index and the number of elements in the collection is greater than the of the .
trans-unit.target: 总和 index 和中的元素数集合大于的。

trans-unit.source: The array is .
trans-unit.target: The array is .

trans-unit.source: The index is not valid for array.
trans-unit.target: The index is not valid for array.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref> collection into a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref>, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 元素复制<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref>集合转换为<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref>指定索引处开始。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref> to copy the elements into.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"> </xref>要复制到的元素。

trans-unit.source: The index from which to start copying into the `array` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 从其开始将复制到索引`array`参数。

trans-unit.source: The sum of index and the number of elements in the collection is greater than the length of the .
trans-unit.target: 总和 index 和中的元素数集合的长度大于 。

trans-unit.source: The array is .
trans-unit.target: The array is .

trans-unit.source: The index is not valid for array.
trans-unit.target: The index is not valid for array.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of errors in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中的错误数。

trans-unit.source: The total number of errors in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的错误总数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的枚举数循环访问<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in a collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但它们不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection"></xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the error at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定索引处的错误。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the error to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的错误的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError"></xref> that contains the error at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError"> </xref> ，其中包含指定索引处的错误。

trans-unit.source: Index parameter is outside array bounds.
trans-unit.target: 索引参数是超出数组界限。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*>。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果访问<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>是同步的 （线程安全）; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*>。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: 可以用于<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>对访问进行同步的对象
